issue.title: [JS] Add DataFrame.scanAsync
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2410](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2410). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add a version of `DataFrame.scan`, `scanAsync` that yields periodically. The yield frequency could be specified either as a number of record batches, or a number of records.

This scan should also be cancellable.
